Artemis::

Artemis came in and looked around she never had seen some thing like 
that, when she heard that JetV would show her the ship, she smiled 
and said "Lead the way"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::JetV::
> "You got it...Lets go." he said walking down into the darkness.
> "Lights, computer.." he said as the lights turned on a computer 
voice
> came on.
> "Good morning JetV.  Welcome guest. (Artemis) The ship is fully 
fueled
> and ready to go.  LAst report is that Pacifix is still with the 
council."
> JetV replied "Computer this is Artemis. She will be a scout with me 
on
> this mission. Please update your memory banks of her info." he then
> looked back to Artemis. "I will show you the ship now."
>

> > > > > > > > > > > > him anymore, "Your battle skills and expertise

ways

> > > > > > > > outright

> > > > wor--

> > > > > > > > > > > > is interupted, as another Dinobot who had 
arrived
> > > > late as

> > > > up.

> > > > > > > > > > > > inspiring speach. "If Grimlock go then Swoop

> > > > > > > > deal
> > > > > > > > > > > > with all kinds of stuff. Grimlock Dinobot

> > > > > > > > go,

> > > > > > > > > > > > Dinobots go as well." Swoop joins

> > > > > > > > sword

> > > > > > > > > > > >

He
> > > > returns
> > > > > > his
> > > > > > > > > > > > attention to the Council, "I do not mind if 
the
> > > > Dinobots
> > > > > > come
> > > > > > > > > > along,

> > Pacifix
> > > > > > frowns
> > > > > > > > at the
> > > > > > > > > > > > gutted podium.

up all
> > > > that he
> > > > > > > > will

> > > > > > > > > > time, "Farewell,"
> > > > > > > > > > > > He grabs his strategy papers and journals, 
puts

> > > > into
> > > > > > a
> > > > > > > > > > > > compartment, and exits the building. He 
transforms
> > > > > > into 'cycle
> > > > > > > > > > > > mode and heads toward the secret ship. He

> > > > > > commlink to
> > > > > > > > > > > > JetV, "JetV, this is Crossroads, what's up? 
I'm
> > > > heading
> > > > > > to the
> > > > > > > > > > ship.

> > > > when
> > > > > > you
> > > > > > > > > > > > travel there... all would be lost if that 
were to
> > > > happen.
> > > > > > > > > > Crossroads
> > > > > > > > > > > > out." He screams along the freeway, and cuts 
off a
> > > > cuts
> > > > > > off a
> > > > > > > > Pred
> > > > > > > > > > > > freighter, showing them his feelings. The 
unkind
> > words
> > > > > > coming
> > > > > > > > from
> > > > > > > > > > > > the freighter proved that the feelings were

> > > > > > looks

> > > > > > > > > > > > > smashed his desk, and was standing at his 
full

> > > > > > very
> > > > > > > > > > upset.

there a

> > > > > > > > yelled,

> > > > > > > > EVEN
> > > > > > > > > > WHOLE
> > > > > > > > > > > > > TIME. YOU SEND A PACIFIST!!" he declared in
> > rage,
> > > > as he
> > > > > > > > pointed
> > > > > > > > > > a

> > sword,
> > > > and
> > > > > > in
> > > > > > > > one
> > > > > > > > > > swipe,

> > > > Grimlock
> > > > > > > > > > stopped and
> > > > > > > > > > > > > looked up at the main council, his sword at 
his
> > > > side,
> > > > > > energy

this
> > > > room.

know
> > that
> > > > if

> > > > > > of us
> > > > > > > > > > can go".

> > > > > > > > > > > > > Grimlock looked back up, then crossed his 
arms,
> > his
> > > > > > sword
> > > > > > > > just
> > > > > > > > > > above

> > > > the

> > > > > > > > of
